alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:48PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Baldwin and west central Escambia Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Stapleton, or 7 miles southeast of Bay Minette, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bay Minette and Stapleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
